reviews.customers_say: Customers love this dress's appearance, with one noting its boho vibes, and appreciate its quality, comfort, and fit. The fabric receives positive feedback for being 100% cotton with a nice feel, and customers find it suitable for various occasions including pregnancy, maternity photos, and baby showers. While some it's not see-through, others mention it's slightly see-through. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Quality Dress
items.body: I absolutely love this dress. It was a great quality for the price point. Itâ€™s very forgiving and I appreciated that it could hide my recently postpartum tummy while also being breastfeeding friendly. I wore this for our family newborn photos and felt confident in this. The material has a nice feel and is flowy - definitely giving boho vibes. The color was not see through which I was concerned about but I did wear nude under garments just in case. If youâ€™re considering purchasing just do it. It can easily be dressed up or down and I know I will get many wears out of this dress. Iâ€™m 5â€™3â€ and it came to just above my ankles. Read more
items.author: Alexis

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Highly recommend! Very flattering
items.body: First off, I bought an XL, I am about 230lbs and 28 weeks pregnant. I bought this at 16 weeks hoping it'd be a good maternity dress with the empire waist. It looks great. Color is exactly as shown. It's treated me very well with a constantly changing body shape (sleeves, chest, waist all being elastic is so nice). Very flattering, material feels expensive, not see through (at least this color). Definitely going to wear it postpartum as well. Read more
items.author: Logan J.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super cute dress but it doesnâ€™t cover the bra strips
items.body: I love the cotton fabric and the fabric is thick but flowy. Not see through and the length is for sure a midi dress. However, it does not cover my bras strips well so I returned the dress. Read more
items.author: Tina Fabrizio

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the TT hype. Would repurchase
items.body: I would size up if you have a bigger chest! Itâ€™s a beautiful dress with really nice fabric! Super comfortable. I got the cream and it was slightly see through so keep that in mind but otherwise would buy again!! Read more

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not worth the price
items.body: Where each embroidered flower is there are a ton of tiny holes rendering it extra see through and I donâ€™t know who canâ€™t justify spending almost 50 dollars on thin cotton with holes in it. The wash would destroy this. Bummed because it has so much potential! A 100% cotton dress thatâ€™s pretty and affordable is hard to find. But itâ€™s definitely going back. Read more
items.author: Kathleen

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: White, Beige, Olivegreen, Darkblue, Fuchsia, Black, Light Pink, Rustbrown, Lightpurple, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
